long_description: Set up a perfect shot of that waterfall in the distance or take a picture of your whole group with the Brunton Aluminum Camera tripod. Its durable aluminum frame is built to handle years of use. 3-way removable pan head lets you manipulate cameras with smooth, steady movement; includes a built-in bubble level. Padded foam "leg warmers" on 2 out of 3 legs provide good grip while carrying or adjusting the tripod. 70.5 in. maximum height. Push-button leg angle adjustment; non-slip rubber feet provide good grip. Includes heavy-duty canvas carry case with adjustable shoulder strap and internal zippered pocket for accessories. Closeout.
short_description: Set up a perfect shot of that waterfall in the distance or take a picture of your whole group with the Brunton Aluminum Camera tripod. Its durable aluminum frame is built to handle years of use.
